code: class  Solution  {   public :   long  long  sumScores ( string  s )  {   const  int  n  =  s . length ();     vector < int >  z ( n );     int  l  =  0 ;   int  r  =  0 ;   for  ( int  i  =  1 ;  i  <  n ;  ++ i )  {   if  ( i  <  r )   z [ i ]  =  min ( r  -  i ,  z [ i  -  l ]);   while  ( i  +  z [ i ]  <  n  &&  s [ z [ i ]]  ==  s [ i  +  z [ i ]])   ++ z [ i ];   if  ( i  +  z [ i ]  >  r )  {   l  =  i ;   r  =  i  +  z [ i ];   }   }   return  accumulate ( z . begin (),  z . end (),  0L )  +  n ;   }  };
